title: Horrifying Details About Uvalde That Must Be Addressed (Ep 1794)
description:
In this episode, I address the horrifying new details surfacing about the Uvalde massacre. I also discuss Biden’s latest whopper of a lie. 

News Picks:


A deeply troubling report on the Uvalde massacre.

Harris Teeter and Kroger go woke.


Household debt is becoming a huge problem. 

This Federal ‘Stimulus’ Program Cost Taxpayers $850k Per Job Saved.


“Mini-Terminator” robots are already on the battlefield. 


China is abusing COVID tracking for surveillance, as predicted.
